companyName: Shenzhen Leekono Optoelectronics Technology Co., Ltd
mobileTip: For the best experience,please view this page on a mobile device.
address: 3rd Floor, No. 6, Jilong Road, Taiwan Industrial Village, Luozu Community, Shiyan Street, Baoan District, Shenzhen

warning.title: Friendly Reminder
warning.description: For the best experience,please view this page on a mobile device.

productMetadata.title: Products
productMetadata.description: We offer a wide variety of high-quality products to meet all your needs.

caseMetadata.title: Cases
caseMetadata.description: This is a collection of cases from various countries and regions.

rental.title: Rental LED
rental.description: Cost-effective for short-term events. Flexible & scalable setups, full technical support included. Always access the latest technology without the high cost of ownership.

outdoor.title: Outdoor LED
outdoor.description: Built for brightness and durability. Resists harsh weather, delivers clear visuals even in direct sunlight, ideal for long-term outdoor advertising.

indoor.title: Indoor LED
indoor.description: High resolution with excellent color performance. Fine pixel pitch ensures ultra-clear images for close-viewing environments like conferences and malls.

poster.title: Poster LED
poster.description: Ultra-thin and lightweight design for easy installation. Energy-efficient and vibrant, seamlessly replacing traditional printed posters.

crystal.title: Crystal LED
crystal.description: Ultra-thin, flexible, and lightweight. Offers high transparency, can be attached to glass surfaces for creative displays without blocking light.

transparent.title: Transparent LED
transparent.description: Maintains high transparency while displaying content. Allows viewers to see through it, perfect for retail windows enhancing product visibility.

floor.title: Floor LED
floor.description: High load-bearing and anti-slip surface. Creates immersive interactive experiences for walking, dancing, and gaming on dynamic graphics.

taxi.title: Taxi LED
taxi.description: Compact, durable, and energy-efficient. Mobile advertising platform for dynamic messaging, city tours, and enhanced brand visibility.

soft.title: Soft LED
soft.description: Bendable and curveable for unique installations. Creates irregular shapes and immersive curved displays for innovative designs.
